alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Horry; Marion; Northern Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 2:33PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Horry and Marion Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 231 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rains, or 10 miles southeast of Marion, moving east at 25 mph. Other, strong were developing along near this storm. These storms will produce very heavy rain and lightning. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, Conway, North Myrtle Beach, Marion, Mullins, Surfside Beach, Myrtle Beach Airport, Little River, Little River Entrance, Socastee, Red Hill, Springmaid Pier, Garden City, North Myrtle Beach Airport, Cherry Grove Inlet, Murrells Inlet, Horry, Loris, Hickory Grove and Nixonville. This includes the following highways... SC Highway 31 between mile markers 5 and 24. SC Highway 22 between mile markers 1 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Coastal Horry; Marion; Northern Horry
